oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: KC Jamboree - NBC performances - 1944-08-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Home recorded KC Jamboree performances, featuring Elmira Ressler, Jose Bethancourt, Curley Bradley, Barbara Marshall, and Prairie Ramblers on October 4, 1944 on radio station NBC. Recording also features KC Jamboree comedy routines.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Elmira Ressler; Jose Bethancourt; Curley Bradley; Barbara Marshall; Prairie Ramblers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Elmira Ressler and Curley Bradley talk (incomplete) -- The Curse Of An Aching Heart (Elmira Ressler) -- Comedy routine (Jamboree members) -- Nola marimba solo (Jose Bethancourt) -- Curley Bradley and Barbara Marshall talk -- There's A Small Hotel (Curley Bradley and Barbara Marshall) -- Comedy routine (Jamboree members) -- Never Let No Worry Worry You (Prairie Ramblers) -- Curley Bradley talks (incomplete) -- Curley Bradley talks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bethancourt, Jose; Bradley, Curley; Marshall, Barbara; Prairie Ramblers;
